thread.title: Assured Consulting Solutions Names Ryan Feeney Partner and VP of Business Development

author: cnbc.com
title: Assured Consulting Solutions Names Ryan Feeney Partner and VP of Business Development
text:
FAIRFAX, Va.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Assured Consulting Solutions (ACS) today announced that Ryan Feeney has joined as Partner and Vice President of Business Development. Leveraging over 20 years of experience, he will be driving ACS business strategy and growth activities.
“We couldn’t be more pleased that a leader with Ryan’s extensive history with Defense and Intelligence agencies, and his background in capturing and delivering business growth, will be joining us as a Partner,” said Mandy Parmer, ACS Managing Partner. “Ryan brings the right experience, relationships, and expertise to help us deliver on our commitment to provide advanced technology solutions and strategic support services in support of critical national security missions.”
Previously Director of Strategic Capture at ManTech, Ryan led pursuits as account executive and capture manager that delivered over $100M annually. Prior to this role, he held related leadership positions at General Dynamics Information Technology (GDIT), serving Intelligence, Defense, and Federal civilian customers.
Commenting on his new role at ACS, Ryan said, “I am honored to be given the opportunity to work with a progressive customer- and employee-focused company such as ACS. I look forward to leveraging the significant work that has already been done to achieve even greater heights together."
About Assured Consulting Solutions
Founded in 2011 and headquartered in Fairfax, Va., Assured Consulting Solutions is a well-respected and trusted partner, domain expert, and provider of expert-level support. ACS is a certified Economically Disadvantaged, Woman-Owned Small Business (EDWOSB) that delivers advanced technology solutions and strategic support services in support of critical national security missions for Intelligence, Defense, and Federal Civilian customers. Learn more at www.assured-consulting.com .
